Justification: To assess long-term blood sugar control and monitor diabetes management.
To rule out any underlying anemia or infection that could contribute to fatigue.
To rule out hypothyroidism, which can cause fatigue.
Low vitamin D levels can contribute to fatigue.
To check for any electrolyte imbalances that could cause fatigue.
To check for any signs of infection or kidney problems.
To rule out sleep apnea, which can cause daytime fatigue.
